definition: graphic art consisting of the graphic or photographic representation of a visual percept
details:
noun
- graphic art consisting of the graphic or photographic representation of a visual percept
= example: graphic art consisting of the graphic or photographic representation of a visual percept
= synonyms: view
- the painted structures of a stage set that are intended to suggest a particular locale
= example: the painted structures of a stage set that are intended to suggest a particular locale
= synonyms: scenery
- the visual percept of a region
= synonyms: prospect
- a consecutive series of pictures that constitutes a unit of action in a film
= synonyms: shot
- a subdivision of an act of a play
= example: a subdivision of an act of a play
- an incident (real or imaginary)
= example: an incident (real or imaginary)
- the context and environment in which something is set
= synonyms: setting
- the place where some action occurs
= example: the place where some action occurs
- a situation treated as an observable object
= synonyms: picture
- a display of bad temper
= synonyms: fit
